p.d: The body of record dealer Jocelyn Gallois is found in a former US Army base. He's been shot in the head with a Colt 45, a weapon used by US troops in the 1960s, when the camp was still in operation. Directed by: Nicolas Herdt (season 2, France, 2016) Screenplay: Tristan Petitgirard, Vincent Robert Cast: Vanessa David (Margot Laurent), Julien Baumgartner (Arthur du Plessis), Christian Rauth (Stavros), Nathalie Blanc (the public prosecutor), Maud Forget (Garnier) Genre: detective
